name: Greyhound Manager 2 Rebooted
description: Manage your own kennel of greyhounds. Train, race, study the detailed form and bet on your dogs and use your winnings to breed new superstars!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or later Processor: 1.0 GHz Dual Core or Greater. Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics hardware. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.4 GHz Dual Core or Greater. Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics hardware. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
